title: Final Cut Pro X v10.0.1 (Mac App Store)
description:
Completely redesigned from the ground up, Final Cut Pro adds extraordinary speed, quality, and flexibility to every part of the post-production workflow.

Revolutionary Video Editing
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Assemble clips in the Magnetic Timeline without clip collisions or sync problems.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Use Clip Connections to attach B-roll, sound effects, and music to the timeline.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Reduce clutter by grouping clips into a Compound Clip. Easily expand it back to single clips.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Perfect your pacing right in the timeline with the Inline Precision Editor.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Cycle through different shots, graphics, or effects at one place in the timeline with Auditions.

Powerful Media Organization
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Import a broad range of formats including native AVCHD, H.264 from DSLRs, and more.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Content Auto-Analysis captures camera metadata and analyzes shots in the background.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Choose analysis options for stabilization, rolling shutter correction, and audio enhancement.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Create and apply custom keywords on the fly as you select ranges in clips.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Smart Collections let you dynamically organize content and find any shot in a few clicks.

Incredible Performance
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ New 64-bit architecture uses all the RAM in your system for larger projects and richer effects.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The Cocoa foundation makes Final Cut Pro more responsive, interactive, and fun to use.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Final Cut Pro taps the GPU on the graphics card and all the cores in your Mac for speed.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Background processing lets you keep working without interruption.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ A ColorSync-managed color pipeline produces accurate, consistent color across applications.

Compelling, Customizable Effects
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Preview effects to see how they look with your footage before applying them.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Change the look of titles, transitions, and effects using intuitive controls.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Control effects with precision using a keyframe editor that appears directly in the timeline.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Adjust the Ken Burns effect with simple onscreen arrows for start and end points.

Integrated Audio Editing
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Let Final Cut Pro repair significant audio problems such as hum, excessive noise, and more.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Sync DSLR video with separate audio in a single step, with instant audio waveform matching.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Enrich your soundtrack with a library of royalty-free sound effects and audio effect plug-ins.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Create immersive audio experiences in 5.1 surround.

Intuitive Color Grading
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improve the look of any clip with the single-click Balance Color feature.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Apply the Match Color feature to match the looks of two clips shot under different conditions.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Manipulate color, saturation, and exposure with the Color Board.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fine tune color for a specific color range or area of the screen using keying and masks.

One-Step, Optimized Output
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Export projects to Apple devices and websites such as Vimeo, YouTube, and Facebook.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Add your content to a set of themed menus, then burn a DVD or Blu-ray disc.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Output files for HTTP live streaming in a single step.

System Requirements: 2GB of RAM (4GB recommended), OpenCL-capable graphics card or Intel HD Graphics 3000 or later, 256MB of VRAM, display with 1280-by-768 resolution or higher, 2.4GB of disk space.
